embedcode: Embed this code into your blog
setting_backcolor: <title>Badge Background Color - Style 1</title><info>Select the background color of the badge if no cover photo is selected. You can use code like this: #45eeff or the name of the color like this: white, black, blue, green...</info>
setting_sitename: <title>Show Site Name?</title><info>If this option is "true" it will show the name of your website on the badge.</info>
setting_fontcolor1: <title>Font Color - Style 1</title><info>Select the font color for Style 1</info>
setting_backcolor2: <title>Badge Background Color - Style 2 & 3</title><info>Select the background color of the badge if no cover photo is selected. You can use code like this: #45eeff or the name of the color like this: white, black, blue, green...</info>
setting_fontcolorname: <title>Font Color - Style 2 & 3 - Name</title><info>Select the font color for the the member's name</info>
setting_fontcolorsite: <title>Font Color - Style 2 - website</title><info>Select the font color for the the sites name</info>
user_setting_usebadge: Can this user group copy the embed code of the badge?
upgrade: You need to upgrade your account to use the code.
coverphoto: To see the badge you must upload a cover photo and a profile image
setting_gradient: <title>Add Gradient Overlay?</title><info>Add a gradient overlay to the cover image from transparency to black.</info>
